basic_prompts: A cat playing in a garden
A dog running on the beach
A bird flying in the sky
A car driving down a road
A person walking in the rain
detailed_prompts: A beautiful cat with orange fur playing with a red ball in a lush green garden with colorful flowers
A golden retriever dog running energetically along a sandy beach with waves crashing in the background
A majestic eagle soaring through clear blue skies with white clouds and mountain peaks below
A sleek sports car driving down a winding mountain road during a stunning sunset
A person in a yellow raincoat walking slowly through a city street during a gentle rain shower
cinematic_prompts: Cinematic shot of a cat playing in a garden, golden hour lighting, shallow depth of field
Epic wide shot of a dog running on the beach, dramatic waves, sunset lighting, 4K quality
Aerial cinematic view of a bird flying over a vast landscape, professional cinematography
Dynamic tracking shot of a car on a mountain road, cinematic color grading, high production value
Atmospheric shot of a person walking in rain, moody lighting, film noir style
artistic_prompts: Impressionist painting style of a cat in a garden, soft brushstrokes, vibrant colors
Watercolor illustration of a dog on a beach, flowing colors, artistic interpretation
Oil painting of a bird in flight, classical art style, rich textures and colors
Abstract representation of a car on a road, geometric shapes, modern art style
Sketch-like drawing of a person in rain, minimalist style, black and white
negative_prompts: ugly, deformed, bad anatomy, worst quality

long_prompts: A magnificent orange tabby cat with bright green eyes playing joyfully with a small red rubber ball in a beautifully maintained garden filled with blooming roses, tulips, and daffodils, surrounded by lush green grass and tall oak trees, during a perfect sunny afternoon with soft golden light filtering through the leaves

An energetic golden retriever with a shiny coat running at full speed along a pristine sandy beach with crystal clear turquoise water, white foam waves gently lapping at the shore, seagulls flying overhead, and a beautiful sunset painting the sky in shades of orange, pink, and purple

A majestic bald eagle with powerful wings spread wide soaring gracefully through a brilliant blue sky dotted with fluffy white clouds, flying high above snow-capped mountain peaks, dense forests, and a winding river valley, captured in stunning detail with perfect lighting and composition
complex_scenes: Multiple cats playing together in a garden with various toys and obstacles
A pack of dogs running together on a beach during a storm with dramatic lighting
A flock of birds performing aerial maneuvers in formation against a sunset sky
Multiple cars racing on a winding mountain road with dynamic camera movements
A group of people walking through a busy city street in heavy rain with reflections
challenging_prompts: A transparent glass cat playing with invisible toys in a mirror-filled room
A dog made of water running on a beach made of clouds
A mechanical bird with clockwork wings flying through a steampunk cityscape
A car driving upside down on the ceiling of a tunnel filled with floating objects
A person walking backwards through time in a constantly changing environment

quality_test_prompts: High quality professional photograph of a cat, studio lighting, 8K resolution
Photorealistic dog portrait, sharp focus, natural lighting, highly detailed
Crystal clear image of a bird in flight, perfect focus, vibrant colors
Ultra-high definition car photography, professional automotive shoot
Portrait photography of a person, professional lighting, sharp details
